recipe.title: Vegetable Slaw
ingredients: 8 cups thinly sliced green cabbage (about 1 small head)
8 ounces sugar snap peas, trimmed, thinly sliced lengthwise
instructions: Whisk vinegar, sugar, salt, and pepper in medium bowl to blend. Gradually whisk in oils. DO AHEAD: Dressing can be made 1 day ahead. Cover and refrigerate.
Place cabbage, radicchio, sugar snap peas, onion, and parsley in large bowl. Add dressing and toss to coat.
